title: Update tagline, remove chatbot, restore legal notice banner, remove team section, replace Cyberabad, update court practice areas, add Telangana High Court banner

quotes: Justice Delivered with Precision & Integrity change this tagline

acceptanceCriteria: The old tagline 'Justice Delivered with Precision & Integrity' no longer appears anywhere on the site
The new tagline 'Trusted Legal Counsel. Proven Results.' is displayed in the hero section of the HomePage

requirements.text: Remove the ChatbotWidget component from the site entirely. Remove its rendering from App.tsx and delete or disable the floating chat button so no chatbot UI is visible to users.

ChatbotWidget is not rendered in App.tsx or any other component

requirements.text: Restore the legal notice banner that has disappeared. Re-add a prominent legal notice/disclaimer banner (e.g., at the top or bottom of every page) informing visitors that the content on this site does not constitute legal advice and is for informational purposes only, in compliance with Bar Council rules.

quotes: the legal notice banner has disappeared bring it back

acceptanceCriteria: A legal notice/disclaimer banner is visible on the site (top or bottom of all pages)
The banner text includes a disclaimer that site content is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice
The banner was previously present and is now restored

requirements.text: Remove the 'Meet Our Team' section from the AboutPage (and any other page where it appears). Do not show team member cards or the team heading anywhere on the site.
acceptanceCriteria: No 'Meet Our Team' heading or team member cards are visible on the About page or any other page
The rest of the About page content (firm story, values) remains intact

requirements.text: Replace every instance of 'Cyberabad' across the entire frontend with 'Medchal Malkajgiri and Kukatpally Courts'. This includes: the Header navigation and dropdowns, the Footer jurisdiction links, the JurisdictionPage component (route slug, page title, SEO metadata, breadcrumbs, content), the sitemap page, and any other component or page that references 'Cyberabad'. Update the route path from '/jurisdiction/cyberabad' to '/jurisdiction/medchal-malkajgiri-kukatpally' and ensure the old path redirects or is replaced.

quotes: in every place remove cyberabad with medchal malkajgiri and kukatpally courts

acceptanceCriteria: The word 'Cyberabad' does not appear anywhere on the site in any user-facing text
All references now read 'Medchal Malkajgiri and Kukatpally Courts'
The jurisdiction page for this court loads correctly at the updated route
Header and Footer links point to the updated route
SEO metadata for the court page uses the updated name

requirements.text: Under each court's jurisdiction page (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, and Medchal Malkajgiri and Kukatpally Courts), list ALL areas of practice that are mentioned anywhere on the site (from the ServicesPage and ServiceDetailPage). Ensure the 'Areas of Practice' section on each court's JurisdictionPage includes the full comprehensive list rather than a partial subset.

quotes: under each court's areas of practise you add all areas of practise mentioned in our site

acceptanceCriteria: Each court jurisdiction page shows a complete list of all practice areas available on the site
No practice area listed on the Services page is missing from any court's jurisdiction page
The practice areas section is clearly labelled 'Areas of Practice' on each court page

requirements.text: Add a special prominent banner or highlight section on the Telangana High Court jurisdiction page (if it exists) or create a dedicated Telangana High Court section/page. The banner should be visually distinct (e.g., gold border, serif heading, elevated card) and highlight that the firm practises at the Telangana High Court, including key information such as types of matters handled at the High Court level.

quotes: give speclai banner under courts of Practising at Telangana High Court

acceptanceCriteria: A special banner or highlighted section labelled 'Practising at Telangana High Court' is visible on the relevant page
The banner is visually distinct from regular content sections
The banner includes descriptive text about the firm's High Court practice
The Telangana High Court is accessible from the site navigation (Header Jurisdictions dropdown and Footer)
